body: I think it will probably be better to issue the fatal outside tensorrt stack, back in the tensorflow domain. This logger is called from within TensorRT library. The api call will return a failure when error happens and then we will create a FATAL log with more information about the context.
body_html: I think it will probably be better to issue the fatal outside tensorrt stack, back in the tensorflow domain. This logger is called from within TensorRT library. The api call will return a failure when error happens and then we will create a FATAL log with more information about the context.
